dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Welcome, one and all, to the main attraction of Area 1, 'Fantasy Blood-shooting Range'!

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Things might get a little too spooky for little ones, so hold on tight to your mommy and daddy's hands!

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Oh, and don't forget about 'Fashinista Show' attraction! We worked really hard on it. Please pay a visit to pick up a free souvenir gift.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Gah... Sancho! Sheesh, you spooked me with your staring again, your grace. Well, I'm thinking of giving out a few souvenirs here. Lady Dulcinea just won't stop teasing me about how my attraction doesn't get a lot of visitors—
Wh... what the heck?
Is this place run by a buncha amateurs or something...?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Wanna know something?
Mm, the quality of audio has found significant improvement in this recording.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Long, long ago... a forever ago, really... Bloodfiends and humans weren't as friendly as we are today. How sad and tragic is that?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Hating each other like cats and dogs, their every meeting resulting in big brawls. Bloodfiends hunted every human they saw... while humans returned Bloodfiends' appetite for human blood with hatred for their kind.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Oh? Oh no! Bad, bad Bloodfiends are trying to eat those humans! Whatever shall we do?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: ... What-ever-shall-we-do?
... Uh... t-talk them out of it?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: BZZZT! Wrong answer! Think again! Who's next?
HAAAAARK!!!
They must be punished with impunity so they may never again hurt the humans!

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Correct!
Kehh... Keeeh.... Ksssh...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Very well, then! Here's a chance for you to defeat those bad, bad Bloodfiends! How splendidly exciting is this?! HAHAHA! HEHEHAHAHA!
<color=#cc2424>In that land...</color>
<color=#cc2424>There won't be any wearisome battles to fight. No constant fear of getting devoured...</color>
<color=#cc2424>There shall be only laughter.</color>
